artist: Engraver: Johann Fredrich Bause; Painter: Anton von Maron
description: man wearing a turban and coalt with large fur collar; head and chest portrait in circular frame with title plaque below
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [JOH. WINKELMAN/ Ant. Maron pinx Romæ 1768  zu finden in ... Bank   J.F. Bause sculps. Lipi 1776]; in pencil on mount: [1-92]
title: Portrait of Jon Winkelman
